name: TitleRecommender
description: Recommends next title given a title

inputs.current title: current job title of the job seeker

outputs.next title: predicted next title recommended for the job seeker

outputs.result: query results from executing the input query in JSON

name: OpenAITripleExtractor
description: Given a text extract entities and relations in the form of source and target entities and relationship between them using OpenAI

inputs.text: text to perform triple extraction on

outputs.triple: list of triples in the form (source:type) -[relation]-> (source:type)

name: OpenAINeo4JQuery
description: Given triples with source and target entities and relationships, transform triples to neo4j querys that can be executed.

inputs.triple: triple to transform into a match query in neo4j cypher query language

outputs.query: neo4j cypher query in text form

name: Recorder
description: Scan JSON documents and find matched entities

inputs.json document: triple to transform into a match query in neo4j cypher query language
inputs.paths: named list of JSONPath queries to exute over json document and record in memory

name: Rationalizer
description: Given one or more text documents rationalize a relation between said documents

name: KnowledgeGrounding
description: Given a text identify missing knowledge to explain

name: JobRecommender
description: Given a resume, recommend a job

inputs.resume: resume of a job seeker in text

outputs.jobs: list of jobs recommended for the job seeker

name: CareerRecommender
description: Given a resume, give career advic

inputs.resume: resume of a job seeker in text

name: JobSearch
description: Search job descriptions database given keywords

inputs.keywords: keywords to query and search the job description database

outputs.jobs: list of jobs descriptions matching job search query keywords

name: JobCandidateMatch
description: Given a resume and job description, predict match

outputs.score: match score indicating job seeker to job matching quality

name: Explainer
description: Given a resume and a job description explain match

outputs.explanation: explanation arguing for job seeker to job match fit

name: CandidateSearch
description: Search candidate resume database given keywords

inputs.keywords: keywords to query and search the candidate resume database

outputs.resumes: list of resumes matching resume search query keywords
